content: the wide shoulder crochet sweater is a long sleeved sweater that is created primarily from two basic stitches - the single_crochet and the double_crochet the neckline is wide and is slightly raised using front and back post stitching to give it a modern off the shoulder look - however if you would prefer a tighter neckline that is less off the shoulder this pattern will show you how to customize it the sweater has ribbing at the base and ribbed cuffs on the sleeves it s designed to hit at the top of your hips however it can also be customized easily as a crop or oversized the wide shoulder crochet sweater is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is beginner friendly and uses weight 4/worsted yarn
